name: Dragon's Lair Part II - Escape from Singe's Castle [C64]
description:
Dragon's Lair: Escape from Singe's Castle is an arcade game developed by ReadySoft and Sullivan Bluth Interactive Media. It came out on 01-01-1991. ReadySoft published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Dragon's Lair: Escape from Singe's Castle on PC.
